physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Left pleural effusion seen on chest radiography, septic pulmonary emboli, cavitary lung lesions; blood samples indicated anemia, thrombocytopenia, hyponatremia, and electrolyte disturbances.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: After several weeks of antibiotic therapy, repeat TEE showed a resolution of vegetations on the tricuspid valve.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Hyponatremia, thrombocytopenia, evidence of disseminated intravascular coagulation; elevated liver function tests. TEE showed multiple vegetations on the tricuspid leaflets.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Complicated by ileus, loculated pleural effusion, pericardial effusion, and anemia.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Pericarditis noted by ECG, cavitary lung lesions; blood cultures and sputum grew MRSA.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Repeat ECG showed resolution of the ST segment changes seen on initial presentation.
